LanguageData.indus_poing_americain.label: Brass Knuckles
LanguageData.indus_poing_americain.description: A brass knuckle are "fist-load weapons" used in hand-to-hand combat. Brass knuckles are pieces of metal shaped to fit around the knuckles.
LanguageData.indus_couteau_poissoir.label: Switchblade
LanguageData.indus_couteau_poissoir.description: Knife often used by thugs. It is light and easy to handle.
